alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Nantucket (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 27 at 10:03AM EST until November 27 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (3.5 to 13.1 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Barnstable MA and Nantucket MA Counties. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal flooding begins on Easy Street in Nantucket. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Buzzards Bay at Woods Hole MLLW Categories - Minor 5.5 ft, Moderate 7.0 ft, Major 8.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 3.5 ft, Moderate 5.0 ft, Major 6.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 27/11 AM 3.9/ 4.4 1.9/ 2.3 1.1/ 1.6 3 None 27/11 PM 4.4/ 4.9 2.3/ 2.8 2.1/ 2.6 5-7 None 28/12 PM 3.1/ 3.6 1.1/ 1.6 0.5/ 1.0 5 None 29/12 AM 2.7/ 3.2 0.8/ 1.3 0.6/ 1.1 4 None 29/12 PM 3.2/ 3.7 1.2/ 1.7 0.7/ 1.1 2 None 30/01 AM 3.0/ 3.5 1.0/ 1.5 0.7/ 1.1 1 None Chatham MA - info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
